Name: The Pillar
About the game: Welcome to The Pillar! Mystery puzzle game on even more mysterious Island. MYSTERY Cleverly mixing mystery and puzzle-solving, the Pillar takes you deep into an unknown world where you explore and relish your surroundings. Each Island has its own unique feel and secrets and it's up to you to solve them. PUZZLES In order to solve puzzles, you must pay attention to things around you as they change and evolve. Keep a clear and open mind as you approach them which unfolds another room to another mystery, another puzzle, and a challenge. ESCAPE Your only hope is to find your way from the everchanging maze of puzzles and escape the mythical cage. Can you solve them all and.... wake up? Dozens of challenging puzzles await you to solve them!
